package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: X11 copy/base buffer synchronization tool (autocutsel)
package-manager.description: autocutsel synchronizes the two copy/paste buffers mainly used by X applications. It automates the use of xcutsel(1). It scans each buffer regularly and synchonizes them.
